oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sanford, Chamberlain and Albers letter, 1876
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanford, Chamberlain and Albers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sanford, Chamberlain and Albers, Knoxville, Tenn., letter to Mr. P.W. Anderson, Newport, Tenn. Apl 1(? 7?), 1876. Re: damaged goods in order. ALS 1 p. Letterhead has etching of Sanford, Chamberlain and Albers building. Krebs Lithographing Company, Cincinnati. Sanford, Chamberlain and Albers, Importers, Manufacturers & Wholesale Dealers in Drugs, Chemicals, Pints, Oils, Patent Medicines. Window Glass, Fancy Goods &Perfumeries. E.J. Sanford, Wm. P. Chamberlain, A.J. Albers. MM-2011-001.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Letterheads;
